hooks.command: echo "Hook triggered after tool use! Changed file: $(jq -r '.tool_output.file_path' <<< "$CLAUDE_EVENT_CONTEXT")"

hooks.prompt: The teammate is idle. Please provide a summary of work done so far based on $ARGUMENTS.

Invoke the update-claude-md skill to review what was discovered or changed during this session and surgically update CLAUDE.md and AGENTS.md to keep both accurate. Apply changes to AGENTS.md only for tool-agnostic content (structure, commands, conventions); Claude-specific content (hooks, skills, agents, MCP) goes in CLAUDE.md only. Only make edits if there is something genuinely new or incorrect to fix.
